ps5Crawler module

ps5Crawler.CreateFirefoxDriver(isHeadless: bool = False) → selenium.webdriver.firefox.firefox_profile.FirefoxProfile

Creating a firefox seleniunm webdriver

Parameters

isHeadless – (bool) enables headless mode of driver (default false)

Returns

(webdriver.FirefoxProfile) created selenium firefox webdriver

ps5Crawler.GetAlphateccSearchResultCount(driver: selenium.webdriver.firefox.firefox_profile.FirefoxProfile, link: str) → int

get search result count for keyword “ps5” on Alphatecc.com

Parameters

  • driver – (webdriver.FirefoxProfile) selenium firefox webdriver to use

  • link – (str) link to ps5 search page

Returns

(int) search result count

ps5Crawler.GetAvailabilityListForStores(driver: selenium.webdriver.firefox.firefox_profile.FirefoxProfile)

checks availability for websites in ‘ps5StorePages’

Parameters

driver – (webdriver.FirefoxProfile) selenium firefox webdriver to use

Returns

(list[bool]) availability status for each site listed in ‘ps5StorePages’

ps5Crawler.GetMessageFromAvailabilityList(availabilityStatusList: list) → str

generating readable text message from availability Status bool list

Parameters

availabilityStatusList – (list[bool]) availability statuses for stores listed in ps5StorePages

Returns

(str) availability statuses as readable message

ps5Crawler.InitSearchResultCounts(driver: selenium.webdriver.firefox.firefox_profile.FirefoxProfile) → NoReturn

laoding search result counts for sites listed in ‘ps5SearchResultCounts’ and writing them in ‘ps5SearchResultsCount’

Parameters

driver – (webdriver.FirefoxProfile) selenium firefox webdriver to use

ps5Crawler.IsAvailableOnAlphatecc(driver: selenium.webdriver.firefox.firefox_profile.FirefoxProfile, link: str) → bool

checks if ps5 might be available on Alphatecc.de by checking if result count for “ps5” keyword search change updates search reslut count in ‘ps5SearchResultCount’ regardless of result

Parameters

  • driver – (webdriver.FirefoxProfile) selenium firefox webdriver to use

  • link – (str) link to ps5 search page

Returns

(bool) availability status for ps5

ps5Crawler.IsAvailableOnAlternate(driver: selenium.webdriver.firefox.firefox_profile.FirefoxProfile, link: str) → bool

checks if ps5 is availible on alternate.de by checking if the add to cart form is hidden or not

Parameters

  • driver – (webdriver.FirefoxProfile) selenium firefox webdriver to use

  • link – (str) link to ps5 store page

Returns

(bool) availability status for ps5

ps5Crawler.IsAvailableOnAmazon(driver: selenium.webdriver.firefox.firefox_profile.FirefoxProfile, link: str) → bool

checks if ps5 is available on amazon.de by checking if element with id #outOfStock exists on page

Parameters

  • driver – (webdriver.FirefoxProfile) selenium firefox webdriver to use

  • link – (str) link to ps5 store page

Returns

(bool) availability status for ps5

ps5Crawler.IsAvailableOnEuronics(driver: selenium.webdriver.firefox.firefox_profile.FirefoxProfile, link: str) → bool

checks if ps5 is available on euronics.de by checking if element with error class is in buybox container element or not

Parameters

  • driver – (webdriver.FirefoxProfile) selenium firefox webdriver to use

  • link – (str) link to ps5 store page

Returns

(bool) availability status for ps5

ps5Crawler.main()
ps5Crawler.ps5AvailabilityCheckFunctions = [<function IsAvailableOnAlternate>, <function IsAvailableOnAmazon>, <function IsAvailableOnEuronics>, <function IsAvailableOnAlphatecc>]

the links for the websites were ps5 might be available order like in ps5AvailabilityCheckFunctions cause the links are used by the functions

ps5Crawler.ps5AvailableMessageTexts: list = ['Alternate (https://www.alternate.de/Sony-Interactive-Entertainment/PlayStation-5-Spielkonsole/html/product/1651220) \n', 'Amazon (https://www.amazon.de/Sony-Interactive-Entertainment-PlayStation-5/dp/B08H93ZRK9/ref=sr_1_3?__mk_de_DE=%C3%85M%C3%85%C5%BD%C3%95%C3%91&dchild=1&keywords=ps5&qid=1631543211&sr=8-3) \n', 'Euronics (https://www.euronics.de/spiele-und-konsolen-film-und-musik/spiele-und-konsolen/playstation-5/spielekonsole/playstation-5-konsole-4061856837826) \\ņ']

the count of items found by “ps5” keyword search the last time checked used to check on websites were the ps5 page is disabled when its not in stock

ps5Crawler.ps5SearchResultCounts: dict = {'Alphatecc': 0}

main loop checking for ps5 availability every 1 min (or 5 min if there were some available last time) if available sending whats app message #TODO add whatsapp number list and document usage

ps5Crawler.ps5StorePages: list = ['https://www.alternate.de/Sony-Interactive-Entertainment/PlayStation-5-Spielkonsole/html/product/1651220', 'https://www.amazon.de/Sony-Interactive-Entertainment-PlayStation-5/dp/B08H93ZRK9/ref=sr_1_3?__mk_de_DE=%C3%85M%C3%85%C5%BD%C3%95%C3%91&dchild=1&keywords=ps5&qid=1631543211&sr=8-3', 'https://www.euronics.de/spiele-und-konsolen-film-und-musik/spiele-und-konsolen/playstation-5/spielekonsole/playstation-5-konsole-4061856837826', 'https://www.alphatecc.de/search?sSearch=ps5']

message snippets to append when ps5 is available on one of the websites order like in ps5AvailabilityCheckFunctions
